attributes.action: ensure all TV licence payers have access to  a digital television service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people throughout Britain are currently unable to receive digital TV. (Indeed many do not even get a full terrestrial TV service)When the plug is finally pulled on terrestrial TV many people will have no TV at all! Do we get our licence fees back?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=TV+licence
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
